basic.description: (Internship Technological Education candidates only). This course is delivered on-line using ICT. Teacher candidates extend their experiences to further investigate concepts, practices, and processes of the curriculum field to write part of a course profile for Grades 11 or 12. Course expectations reflect the Standards of Practice for the teaching profession described by the Ontario College of Teachers.
basic.subject: CURR
basic.title: Curriculum Dev in Tech Ed,Pt 2
